title: Burundi Money Supply M3
description: Money Supply M3 in Burundi increased to 3670114.90 BIF Million in May from 3577710.70 BIF Million in April of 2022. Money Supply M3 in Burundi averaged 1334048.37 BIF Million from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3670114.90 BIF Million in May of 2022 and a record low of 365559.80 BIF Million in January of 2008. This page provides the latest reported value for - Burundi Money Supply M3 - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
